#summary About the integration into StudIP

There is a ready integration of !OpenMeetings for the Learning Environment !StudIP (http://studip.de) available. It was developed at the Uni Trier and Data-Quest. 

It is already listed in the !StudIP marketplace:
http://plugins.studip.de/index.php/Plugins/00067

There is also a demo and downloads available. You can get more information by following contacts: 
bohnsack (at) data-quest (dot) de
